name: Quietus
description:
A game about repairing our relationship with death. Created for Global Game Jam 2020.

Your best friend Julia, who is dying of a terminal illness, has chosen to end her life through the Quietus: physician-assisted death that takes 6 hours. During that six-hour period, you and Julia revisit places that are important to her, and Julia slowly lets go of living.

Writing/programming: Elizabeth Ballou

Art: Alina Constantin
